javadoc:
A collection of utility functions for traversing constructors and Pcode operations of SLEIGH
 languages

methods.name: traverseConstructors
methods.comment: Traverse the constructors of a given SLEIGH language

params.name: visitor
params.comment: a callback for each constructor visited

methods.name: traverseConstructors
methods.comment: Traverse the constructors of a given table

params.name: visitor
params.comment: a callback for each constructor visited

methods.name: traverseAllPcodeOps
methods.comment:
Traverse the Pcode operations of a given SLEIGH language
 
 During traversal, if a "NOP" constructor, i.e., one having no Pcode operations, is
 encountered, the callback is still invoked at least once, with a null Pcode operation. This
 is so NOP constructors are not overlooked by this traversal.

params.name: visitor
params.comment: a callback for each Pcode operation visited

name: SleighLanguages
comment:
A collection of utility functions for traversing constructors and Pcode operations of SLEIGH
 languages
